remarks: A simple path of length 2 between two vertices (in a graph) as ordered triple.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Mar-2018.)
statement:
el2spthsoton $p |- ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y ) -> ( T e. ( V 2SPathsOt E ) <-> E. a e. V E. b e. V T e. ( a ( V 2SPathOnOt E ) b ) ) ) $.
$d E a b $.
$d T a b $.
$d V a b $.
